|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, eMMC module connector, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Micro-B) Female |serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, IR receiver, ADC header, I2C, SPI, GPIO, CVBS header, SPDIF, |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, 3-VRMS Audio Line Driver;3Peak IC;TPF632A;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;4;,,, Ultra low dropout, 500mA, CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;2;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;Maxim Integrated;MAX809R;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Debian, Android 7.1, LibreELEC, |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 06/2017 |estprice = 35 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Libre Computer Board
AML-S905X-CC-V1.0-A'' is silkscreened on the board near the 40-pin GPIO connector. {{see also|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905X @1.5GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-450'' @750MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot, eMMC module socket *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM • [[SK hynix]] *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 4x USB 2.0 ports ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/librecomputer/libre-computer-board-next-gen-4k-sbc-dev-board-for ''AML-S905X-CC Le Potato: Fastest 4K SBC under $50 for Makers'' on '''Kickstarter'''] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libre_Computer_Project#AML-S905X-CC_(Le_Potato) ''AML-S905X-CC (Le Potato)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/06/30/libre-computers-le-potato-amlogic-s905x-development-board-goes-for-25-and-up-crowdfunding/ ''Libre Computer’s Le Potato Amlogic S905X Development Board Goes for $25 and Up (Crowdfunding)'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/07/17/le-potato-development-board-review-part-1-hardware-and-accessories/ ''Le Potato Development Board Review – Part 1: Hardware and Accessories'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] ==See also== ===Models=== :;[[Libre Computer]] • [[List of SBCs]] *[[Libre Computer Alta]] (AML-A311D-CC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, AI Accelerator *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1GB/2GB, [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Sweet Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC-V2) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1GB/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Renegade Elite]] (ROC-RK3399-PC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Solitude]] (AML-S905D3-CC) • 2GB/4GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC IoT H2+) • 512MB, 32-bit *[[Libre Computer Tritium H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB, 32-bit • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB, 64-bit [[Category:English Documentation]]
